# EFSPI statistical methodology leaders

In September 2023 EFSPI founded a new group _EFSPI statistical methodology leaders_, bringing together methodology leaders to work on topics of common interest.

Find more context in this [linkedin post](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/kasparrufibach_biostatistics-statistics-drugdevelopment-activity-7084613881087578113-teIX/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=member_desktop) and [this slidedeck](20230913_EFSPI_methodology_group_linkedin.pdf).

A list of current members is available [here](methods_members.html).

# Feedback 

For feedback and questions send an email to [efspieurope@gmail.com](efspieurope@gmail.com).
